Added support for education scenarios, including the following resources:, [Schools](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationschool?view=graph-rest-beta), [Classes](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationclass?view=graph-rest-beta), [Users](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationuser?view=graph-rest-beta), [Assignments](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationassignment?view=graph-rest-beta), [Submissions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/educationsubmission?view=graph-rest-beta), See the resource topics for details about the methods that are available.

Ajout de la [workbookOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/workbookoperation) relation Ã  lâ€™entitÃ© au [Classeur](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/workbook?view=graph-rest-beta).

Ajout de la mÃ©thode [Obtenir workbookOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/workbookoperation-ge) Ã  lâ€™entitÃ© [workbookOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/workbookoperation?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added the **legacyId** property to the [Excel Table](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/table?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. This will contain the numeric value identifier (string data type) that will remain constact for a given Excel table. This is provided as an additional metadata if the application relied on the legacy identifier used in older Excel client applications. Note: The **id** and **legacyId** property should be treated as an opaque string value and should not be parsed to any other type within your application.

Added workbookPivotTable resource, refresh and refreshAll action on pivotTables, workbookRangeView resource, visibleView action on the filtered range to return workbookRangeView to the user, get rows collection and range resource off of visibleView, columnsAfter, columnsBefore, resizedRange, rowsAbove, and rowsBelow functions off of range resource, and new table properties.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Power your apps with the new Excel REST API on the Microsoft Graph
ChangeList.Description: Excel REST API on Microsoft Graph is generally available. Now you can build rich and deep integrations with Excel workbooks in Microsoft 365. See the [Power your apps with the new Excel REST API on the Microsoft Graph](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/power-your-apps-with-the-new-excel-rest-api/) blog post for more details.
ChangeList.Target: Power your apps with the new Excel REST API on the Microsoft Graph

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph
ChangeList.Description: We are adding new Excel REST APIs that let you read and modify data in an Excel workbook. It is now possible to build smart apps that allows users to get value out of the content stored in an Excel workbook by providing insights into the data. Take advantage of analytical powers of Excel, create tables and charts and extract visually appealing chart image - all from within your app. For details, see [Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/excel?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph

- [List messages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Get message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-get?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [List mail folders](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Get mail folder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [List child folders](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [List messages in folder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Get message delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Get mail folder delta](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0)
- [Create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) subscriptions for change notifications on message

Also added Mail.ReadBasic.All support in [delta query for message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) and [delta query for mailFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Scoping application permissions to specific Exchange Online mailboxes
ChangeList.Description: Added the capability for administrators to limit app access to only specific mailboxes, even when an app has been granted application permissions to mail, mailbox settings, calendars, or contacts. For more details, see [Scoping application permissions to specific Exchange Online mailboxes](auth-limit-mailbox-access.md).
ChangeList.Target: Scoping application permissions to specific Exchange Online mailboxes

ChangeList.Description: Added the [mailSearchFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailsearchfolder?graph-rest-1.0) entity, which is derived from and supports the methods of the [mailFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added support for a new [Mail.ReadBasic (preview) permission](permissions-reference.md#mail-permissions) for [List Messages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) and [Get Message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-get?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.Description: Rolled back the type changes related to [findMeetingTimes](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-beta) documented in [February 2019](#february-2019). The specific changes are listed in the following rows.

Changed the data type of the following parameters of [findMeetingTimes](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-beta):
**attendees**: from **attendeeDataModel** back to [attendeeBase](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeebase?view=graph-rest-beta)
**locationConstraint**: from **locationConstraints** back to [locationConstraint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraint?view=graph-rest-beta)
**timeConstraint**: from **findMeetingTimesTimeConstraints** back to [timeConstraint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeconstraint?view=graph-rest-beta)

Changed the return type of **findMeetingTimes** from **findMeetingTimesResponse** back to [meetingTimeSuggestionsResult](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingTimeSuggestionsResult?view=graph-rest-beta)

Changed the base type of [locationConstraintItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraintitem?view=graph-rest-beta) from **locationDataModel** back to [location](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta)

Changed the data types of the following properties of [meetingTimeSuggestion](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestion?view=graph-rest-beta):
**attendeeAvailability**: from collection of **attendeeAvailabilityDataModel** back to collection of [attendeeAvailability](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeeavailability?view=graph-rest-beta)
**locations**: from collection of **locationDataModel** back to collection of [location](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta)
**meetingTimeSlot**: from **meetingTimeSlotDataModel** back to [timeSlot](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeslot?view=graph-rest-beta)
**organizerAvailability**: from **availabilityStatus** back to **freeBusyStatus**

Complex types:
**attendeeAvailabilityDataModel**
**attendeeDataModel**
**findMeetingTimesResponse**
**findMeetingTimesTimeConstraints**
**locationConstraints**
**meetingTimeSlotDataModel**
**searchWindowTimeSlot**

Enumerations:
**addressType**
**availabilityStatus**

Restored the following complex types:
[attendeeAvailability](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeeavailability?view=graph-rest-beta)
[locationConstraint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraint?view=graph-rest-beta)
[meetingTimeSuggestionsResult](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestionsresult?view=graph-rest-beta)
[timeConstraint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeconstraint?view=graph-rest-beta)

**attendeeAvailability**: from collection of **attendeeAvailability** to collection of [attendeeAvailabilityDataModel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeeavailabilitydatamodel?view=graph-rest-beta)
**locations**: from collection of [location](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) to collection of [locationDataModel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationdatamodel?view=graph-rest-beta)
**meetingTimeSlot**: from [timeSlot](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeslot?view=graph-rest-beta) to [meetingTimeSlotDataModel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimeslotdatamodel?view=graph-rest-beta)
**organizerAvailability**: from **freeBusyStatus** to **availabilityStatus**

New complex types:

[attendeeDataModel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeedatamodel?view=graph-rest-beta)

[meetingTimeSlotDataModel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimeslotdatamodel?view=graph-rest-beta)
[postalAddress](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/postaladdress?view=graph-rest-beta)
[searchWindowTimeSlot](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/searchwindowtimeslot?view=graph-rest-beta)

Removed the following complex types:
**attendeeAvailability**
**locationConstraint**
**meetingTimeSuggestionsResult**
**timeConstraint**
The **internetMessageHeaders** property of the [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity is now writeable on message creation.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: getSchedule,freeBusyError,scheduleInformation,scheduleItem,getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time
ChangeList.Description: Added the [getSchedule](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-getschedule?view=graph-rest-beta) action, and the [freeBusyError](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/freebusyerror?view=graph-rest-beta), [scheduleInformation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scheduleinformation?view=graph-rest-beta), and [scheduleItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scheduleitem?view=graph-rest-beta) complex types to support [getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time](outlook-get-free-busy-schedule.md).
ChangeList.Target: getSchedule,freeBusyError,scheduleInformation,scheduleItem,getting the free/busy, availability information for users, distribution lists, and resources for a given period of time

ChangeList.Description: Added the complex type [typedEmailAddress](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/typedemailaddress?view=graph-rest-beta).

Changed the type of the **emailAddresses** property of [contact](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta) to be a collection of **typedEmailAddress** instances.

Added the **locations** property to the [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity to support organizing an event that attendees can attend from more than one location.
Added the **locationType** property to the [location](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added the **uniqueId** and **uniqueIdType** properties to the [location](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type. These properties are only for internal use at this point.
Added [mailSearchFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailsearchfolder?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the following APIs for mail search folder: [Create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailsearchfolder-post?view=graph-rest-beta), [Update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailsearchfolder-update?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added support for mail search folder to [delete mailFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [get mailFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-beta), and [list child folders](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-childfolders?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **flag** property to the [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. Added the shared [followupFlag](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/followupflag?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.
Added the **internetMessageHeaders** property to the [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the [internetMessageHeader](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/internetmessageheader?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added the **messageRules** navigation property to the [mailFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. **messageRules** is a collection of [messageRule](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/messagerule?view=graph-rest-1.0) instances.

Added the [messageRule](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/messagerule?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity, and [messageRuleActions](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/messageruleactions?view=graph-rest-1.0), [messageRulePredicates](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/messagerulepredicates?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [sizeRange](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/sizerange?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex types.

Added the following CRUD operations for message rules: [create](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-post-messagerules?view=graph-rest-1.0), [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-list-messagerules?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/messagerule-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/messagerule-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [delete](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/messagerule-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the **flag** property to the [contact](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. Added the shared [followupFlag](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/followupflag?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get that shared mail folder,get the messages in that shared calendar
ChangeList.Description: This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared mail folder or its message contents, when a user has shared a mail folder with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user. In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared mail folder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), or [get the messages in that shared calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-1.0), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.
ChangeList.Target: get that shared mail folder,get the messages in that shared calendar

ChangeList.Description: Added the [findRoomLists](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findroomlists?view=graph-rest-beta) and [findRooms](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findrooms?view=graph-rest-beta) functions to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the **locations** property to the [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to support organizing an event that attendees can attend from more than one location.
Added the **locationType** property to the [location](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.

Added the **uniqueId** and **uniqueIdType** properties to the [location](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type. These properties are only for internal use at this point.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: get that shared calendar,get the events in that shared calendar
ChangeList.Description: This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared calendar or its event contents, when a user has shared a calendar with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user. In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), or [get the events in that shared calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-1.0), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.
ChangeList.Target: get that shared calendar,get the events in that shared calendar

ChangeList.Description: Promoted the following 4 [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) properties to v1.0: **canEdit**, **canShare**, **canViewPrivateItems**, and **owner**.

Support getting an **event** body in plain text, as an alternative to the default HTML format. See [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-beta) events for details.

For **findMeetingTimes**, added new enum value **unrestricted** that you specify as the **activityDomain** property, part of the **timeConstraint** parameter. This lets **findMeetingTimes** look for times appropriate for the type of activity you're scheduling for. See details in the [request body](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-1.0#request-body) section.

Support getting a **message** body in plain text, as an alternative to the default HTML format. See [get](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [list](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) events for details.
hexColor added to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

New action [findMeetingTimes](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-1.0) for the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
New complex type [attendeeBase](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeebase?view=graph-rest-1.0) which consists of a type property for the attendee type.

New complex types:, [attendeeAvailability](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendeeavailability?view=graph-rest-1.0), [locationConstraint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraint?view=graph-rest-1.0) , [locationConstraintItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/locationconstraintitem?view=graph-rest-1.0), [meetingTimeSuggestion](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestion?view=graph-rest-1.0), [meetingTimeSuggestionsResult](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingtimesuggestionsresult?view=graph-rest-1.0), [timeConstraint](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeconstraint?view=graph-rest-1.0), [timeSlot](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeslot?view=graph-rest-1.0)

The [attendee](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendee?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type is now derived from attendeeBase, which in turn is derived from [recipient](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recipient?view=graph-rest-1.0). Including the inherited properties, it consists of the same **status**, **type** and **emailAddress** properties as before.

[Extended properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/extended-properties-overview?view=graph-rest-1.0) are now supported by the following resources: message, mailFolder, event, calendar, contact, contactFolder, group event, group calendar, group post.
Added [forward](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-forward?view=graph-rest-beta) action to the event resource.

Added the following properties to the [calendar](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to support calendar sharing: **canEdit**, **canShare**, **canViewPrivateItems**, **isShared**, **isShareWithMe**, and **owner**.
Added the **onlineMeetingUrl** property to the [event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for creating, listing, getting, and deleting one or more instances of [mention](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mention?view=graph-rest-beta) in a message. Mentions support calling out to get the attention of other users in a message.

Added support for the [getMailTips](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-getmailtips?view=graph-rest-beta) action to get any MailTips for specific recipients. Added the following resources: [automaticRepliesMailTips](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/automaticrepliesmailtips?view=graph-rest-beta), [mailTips](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailtips?view=graph-rest-beta), [mailTipsError](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailtipserror?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs
ChangeList.Description: As part of the schema change where a few properties are being removed and corresponding collections are being added to contacts endpoint, the following properties have been added to the contacts endpoint: _Websites Collection(ComplexType: Website)_,_Phones Collection (ComplexType: Phone)_, _PostalAddress Collection(ComplexType: PhysicalAddress)_. For details, see the [Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/upcoming-changes-to-contacts-and-people-apis/) blog post.
ChangeList.Target: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs
ChangeList.Description: As part of the schema change where a few properties are being removed and corresponding collections are being added to contacts endpoint, the following properties have been removed from the contacts endpoint: _BusinessHomePage_,_HomePhones_, _MobilePhone1_, _BusinessPhones_, _HomeAddress_, _BusinessAddress_, _OtherAddress_. For details, see the [Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/upcoming-changes-to-contacts-and-people-apis/) blog post.
ChangeList.Target: Upcoming changes to Contacts and People APIs

ChangeList.Description: Added _extensions_, which is abstract type to support the OData v4 open type openTypeExtension.
Added _responseRequested_ to the **eventMessageRequest** entity.
Added _extensions_ to the **event** entity, which is abstract type to support the OData v4 open type openTypeExtension.
Added _inferenceClassification_ and _extensions_ to the **eventMessage** entity.
Added _inferenceClassification_ and _extensions_ to the **message** entity.
Added _wellknownname_ to the **contactFolder** entity.
Added _singleValueExtendedProperties_ and _multiValueExtendedProperties_ properties.
Added _suggestionHint_ property to _meetingTimeCandidate_.
Added _locationUri_ property to _location_.
Added _type_ and _postOfficeBox_ to _physicalAddress_.
_findMeetingTimes_ now takes new parameter _ReturnSuggestionHints_.
_findMeetingTimes_ now returns a collection of _meetingTimeCandidate_.

Added _startDateTime_, _endDateTime_, _location_, _type_, _recurrence_, _isOutOfDate_, _conversationIndex_, _unsubscribe_, _unsubscribeData_, _unsubscribeEnabled_ and _flag_ properties to the **eventMessage** entity.
Added _singleValueExtendedProperties_ and _multiValueExtendedProperties_ properties to the **eventMessage** entity.
Added new method _unsubscribe_ to the **eventMessage** entity.
Added _wellKnownName_ and _userConfigurations_ properties to the **mailFolder** entity.
Added _singleValueExtendedProperties_ and _multiValueExtendedProperties_ properties to the **mailFolder** entity.
Renamed _mobilePhone1_ property to _mobilePhone_ in the **message** entity.
_createReply_ and _createReplyAll_ of the **message** entity take new parameter _Message_ and _comment_.
_createForward_ of the **message** entity takes new parameters _Message_, _ToRecipients_ and _comment_.
_reply_, _replyAll_ and _forward_ of the **message** entity take new parameter _Message_.
Added _mobilePhone_ property to the **message** entity.
Added _internetMessageId_ property to the **message** entity. The message ID in the format specified by [RFC2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt).

Added new properties _sourceUrl_, _providerType_, _thumbnailUrl_, _previewUrl_, _permission_ and _isFolder_ to the **referenceAttachment** entity. (Reference attachments are supported in an **event**, **message**, **outlookTask**, or **post**.)
Added _singleValueExtendedProperties_ and _multiValueExtendedProperties_ properties to the **referenceAttachment** entity.
Added new enum types _referenceAttachmentProvider_ and _referenceAttachmentPermission_.
Added mobilePhone property to personal contacts entity-set.
Added mobilePhone property to personal contacts entity-set.
Added eventMessageRequest subtype of eventMessage and startDateTime, endDateTime, location, type, recurrence and isOutOfDate properties to eventMessage type.

Added the **system** property to the [Drive][Drive-beta] resource.

Added new complex types: [CommentAction][CommentAction-beta], [CreateAction][CreateAction-beta], [DeleteAction][DeleteAction-beta], [EditAction][EditAction-beta], [ItemActionSet][ItemActionSet-beta], [ItemActivityTimeSet][ItemActivityTimeSet-beta], [MentionAction][MentionAction-beta], [MoveAction][MoveAction-beta], [PublicationFacet][PublicationFacet-beta], [RenameAction][RenameAction-beta], [RestoreAction][RestoreAction-beta], [ShareAction][ShareAction-beta], and [VersionAction][VersionAction-beta].
Added the **driveType** property to the [ItemReference][ItemReference-beta] complex type.
Removed the **tenantId** property from [SharepointIds][SharepointIds-beta] complex type.
Added the [CheckIn][CheckIn-beta] and [CheckOut][CheckOut-beta] actions on the [DriveItem][DriveItem-beta] resource.
Added the **expirationDateTime**, **password**, **message**, and **recipients** properties on the [CreateLink][CreateLink-beta] action on a [DriveItem][DriveItem-beta] resource.
Added the **system** property to the [Drive][] resource.
Added the **list** relationship to the [Drive][] resource.
Added the **listItem** relationship to the [DriveItem][] resource.
Added the **list** and **listItem** relationships to the [SharedDriveItem][] resource.
Added new complex types: [FolderView][]
Added the **view** property to the [Folder][] complex type.
Added the **driveType** property to the [ItemReference][] complex type.
Added the **audioBitsPerSample**, **audioChannels**, **audioFormat**, **audioSamplesPerSecond**, **fourCC** and **frameRate** properties to the [Video][] complex type.
Added the **audioBitsPerSample**, **audioChannels**, **audioFormat**, **audioSamplesPerSecond**, **fourCC** and **frameRate** properties to the [Video][Video-beta] complex type.

Added the **configuratorUrl** and **webHtml** properties to **sharingLink**. ,  Added the **folderView** resource type and the **view** property to the **folder** resource type. ,  Added the **listItem** navigation property to **driveItem**. ,  Added the **list** navigation property to **drive**.
Added the **baseItem** resource type, consisting of basic properties from **driveItem**.

Added the **sourceItemId** property to **thumbnail**. ,  Added the **siteUrl** property to **sharepointIds**. ,  Added the **sharedBy** and **sharedDateTime** properties to **shared**. ,  Added the **shared** property to **remoteItem**. ,  Added the **sharepointIds** property to **drive** and **itemReference**. ,  Added **lastAccessedDateTime** to **fileSystemInfo**. ,  Added the **driveItem** and **site** navigation properties to **sharedDriveItem**. ,  Added the **parentReference** property to **baseItem**.
Changed **driveItem** and **sharedDriveItem** to inherit from **baseItem**. ,  Marked **identity** as an Open Type.
Added _shared_ collection to allow accessing shared driveItems by shareId or sharing URL.
Added _search_ function to a drive, which allows searching for more items than just those in the drive's root folder.
Added support for _createUploadSession_, which allows uploading files larger than 4 MB to OneDrive, OneDrive for Business, and SharePoint document libraries.
Added _sharepointIds_ property to driveItem that returns traditional SharePoint API identifiers for driveItems stored in SharePoint.
Added additional properties on _remoteItem_.
Added the _quickXorHash_ value for files in OneDrive for Business.
Added scope to the _createSharingLink_ to allow creating company sharable links or anonymous sharing links.
Added **CreateUploadSession** method on **driveItem**, which allows large file and resumable uploads.
Added properties for tracking SharePoint IDs on items from SharePoint (**sharepointIds**) and a property to identify root folders (**root**).
Added **Shares** root collection, which can be used with shareIds or sharing links to access shared items in OneDrive and SharePoint. Returns a new type, sharedDriveItem.
Added **Invite** method on driveItem, which allows adding permissions to items.
Added **Search** method on drive, which allows searching across items in the drive and shared items.
Added **processingMetadata** property on file complex type quickXorHash property on hashes complex type.
Added **quickXorHash** property on hashes complex type.

Added _invite_ function to send a sharing invitation to an existing item. A sharing invitation creates a unique sharing link and sends an email to the recipient of the invitation that includes the sharing link. Example: POST /drive/items/{item-id}/invite.

Added _recent_ function to list a set of items that have been recently used by the signed in user. This list includes items that are in the user's drive as well as items they have access tofrom other drives. Example: GET /me/drive/recent.
Added _sharedWithMe_ function to list the set of items that are shared with the current user. Example: GET /me/drive/sharedWithMe.
Added _remoteItem_ type to provide a link to an item in another drive.
Added _sharingInvitation_ type to provide details of any associated sharing invitation for this permission.
Added _delta_ function to track changes to items in a drive. Example: GET /me/drive/items/{item-id}/delta
Added _copy_ that creates a copy of a _driveItem_ (including any children), under a new parent or with a new name. Example: POST /me/drive/items/{item-id}/copy.
_conflictBehavior_ instance attributes is now applicable to _driveItem_.
New _remoteItem_ property on driveItem for Microsoft accounts.

ChangeList.Description: Added resources and method APIs for Microsoft Intune. This is a large set of resources and methods to support the public preview of Intune on Azure Portal. For information about the Intune service, see the [Intune documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=836405). For information about the Intune resources and APIs, see [Working with Intune in Microsoft Graph](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-graph-overview?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: Intune documentation,Working with Intune in Microsoft Graph

ChangeList.Description: Azure AD Application Proxy APIs are now available in the Microsoft Graph beta endpoint. These APIs allow for secure publishing of on-premises applications to users outside the corporate network using Azure AD as the common control plane for access. You can use the published APIs to write applications that can retrieve and update various aspects of application proxy, such as _connectors_, _connectorGroups_ and the _onPremisesPublishing_ settings of an application.

Added financials APIs for Dynamics 365 Business Central. For details, see the [Financials API reference](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/dynamics-graph-reference?view=graph-rest-1.0).

New entities - [outlookuser](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookuser?view=graph-rest-beta), [outlookTaskGroup](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlooktaskgroup?view=graph-rest-beta), [outlookTaskFolder](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlooktaskfolder?view=graph-rest-beta), and [outlookTask](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlooktask?view=graph-rest-beta) - and their methods support organizing and accessing Outlook tasks.

Outlook tasks support attachments ([attachment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachment?view=graph-rest-beta), [fileAttachment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/fileattachment?view=graph-rest-beta), [itemAttachment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/itemattachment?view=graph-rest-beta), and [referenceAttachment](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/referenceattachment?view=graph-rest-beta) resources).

Outlook tasks support [extended properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/extended-properties-overview?view=graph-rest-beta) ([singleValueLegacyExtendedProperty](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/singlevaluelegacyextendedproperty?view=graph-rest-beta) and [multiValueLegacyExtendedProperty](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/multivaluelegacyextendedproperty?view=graph-rest-beta) resources).

ChangeList.Description: Added the following resources: [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resouces/call?view=graph-rest-1.0), [participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resouces/participant?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resouces/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added the [delete onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-delete.md) operation.

Changed return type for [mute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) and [mute participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) methods from [commsOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) to [muteParticipantOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/muteparticipantoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).

Changed return type for [unmute](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta) method from [commsOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) to [unmuteParticipantOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unmuteparticipantoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the [keepAlive](/api-reference/beta/api/call-keepalive.md) action to the [call](/api-reference/beta/resources/call.md) entity.

Added new action [updateRecordingStatus](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-updaterecordingstatus?view=graph-rest-beta) to [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new complex type [incomingContext](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incomingcontext?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new property **incomingContext** to [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new property **endpointType** to [participantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added new property **endpointType** to [invitationParticipantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/invitationparticipantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added new property **recordingStatus** to [recordingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Removed property **status** from [recordingInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.

Removed inheritance of [participantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) from [invitationParticipantInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/invitationparticipantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added /communications/* APIs for all calls and online meetings. The **/app** path is deprecated. Going forward, use the **/communications** path.
Removed the properties **createdDateTime** and **lastActionDateTime** from the [commsOperation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/.api/resource/commsOperation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the property **meetingType** from the [onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlineMeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the property **isBroadcast** to the [onlineMeeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlineMeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Renamed the **resource** property to **resourceUrl** on the [commsNotification](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsNotification?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the type of the **code** and **subCode** properties from string to Int32 on the [resultInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/resultInfo?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Renamed the **subcode** property to **subCode** on the [resultInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/resultInfo?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added **mediaState** property to [call](/api-reference/beta/resources/call.md) resource
Renamed **recordResourceLocation** property in [recordOperation](/api-reference/beta/resources/recordOperation.md) resource to **recordingLocation**
Renamed **recordResourceAccessToken** property in [recordOperation](/api-reference/beta/resources/recordOperation.md) resource to **recordingAccessToken**
Added **capabilities** property to [onlineMeeting](/api-reference/beta/resources/onlinemeeting.md) resource
Added **videoTeleconferenceId** property to [onlineMeeting](/api-reference/beta/resources/onlinemeeting.md) resource
Added **producers** property to [meetingParticipants](/api-reference/beta/resources/meetingparticipants.md) resource
Added **contributors** property to [meetingParticipants](/api-reference/beta/resources/meetingparticipants.md) resource
The [application](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) resource was updated to add a calls collection.
The [operation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/operation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource was updated to support long-running calls and meetings APIs.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: call,creating calls,retrieving a call,deleting (hanging up) a call,answering a call,rejecting a call,redirecting a call,transferring a call,IVR scenarios,playing a prompt,recording a call,cancel media processing,subscribing to touch tone notifications
ChangeList.Description: Added the [call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource for managing audio/video calls (initially, in Microsoft Teams), including APIs for [creating calls](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-post-calls?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [deleting (hanging up) a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [answering a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-answer?view=graph-rest-beta), [rejecting a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-reject?view=graph-rest-beta), [redirecting a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-redirect?view=graph-rest-beta), and [transferring a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-transfer?view=graph-rest-beta). We've also added APIs to support [IVR scenarios](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calls-api-ivr-overview?view=graph-rest-beta): [playing a prompt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-playprompt?view=graph-rest-beta), [recording a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-record?view=graph-rest-beta), [cancel media processing](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-cancelmediaprocessing?view=graph-rest-beta), and [subscribing to touch tone notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-subscribetotone?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: call,creating calls,retrieving a call,deleting (hanging up) a call,answering a call,rejecting a call,redirecting a call,transferring a call,IVR scenarios,playing a prompt,recording a call,cancel media processing,subscribing to touch tone notifications

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: participant,retrieving a participant object,configuring the audio mixer for a participant,one,all,retrieving a list of the participants,inviting participants
ChangeList.Description: Added the [participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing the participants in audio/video calls and meetings, including [retrieving a participant object](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [configuring the audio mixer for a participant](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-configuremixer?view=graph-rest-beta), muting [one](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) or [all](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta) of the participants, [retrieving a list of the participants](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta) in a call/meeting, and [inviting participants](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta) to a call/meeting.
ChangeList.Target: participant,retrieving a participant object,configuring the audio mixer for a participant,one,all,retrieving a list of the participants,inviting participants

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: share content,mute and unmute itself,update the metadata associated with a call
ChangeList.Description: Added APIs for applications to manage and participate in calls and meetings, including the ability to [share content](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta), [mute and unmute itself](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta), and [update the metadata associated with a call](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-updatemetadata?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: share content,mute and unmute itself,update the metadata associated with a call

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: audio routing group,creating audio routing groups,retrieving a list of them,updating,deleting
ChangeList.Description: Added the [audio routing group](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing private audio routes between participants in a multiparty conversation, including [creating audio routing groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a list of them](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta), and [updating](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta) and [deleting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) them.
ChangeList.Target: audio routing group,creating audio routing groups,retrieving a list of them,updating,deleting

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: online meeting,retrieve an online meeting object,audio conference information
ChangeList.Description: Added the [online meeting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing Microsoft Teams online meetings. Initially, there is only one API for online meetings, to [retrieve an online meeting object](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta). A related resource for the [audio conference information](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta) associated with a meeting (e.g. dial-in URL, passcodes, and phone numbers) was also added.
ChangeList.Target: online meeting,retrieve an online meeting object,audio conference information

ChangeList.Description: Many of the calls and meetings APIs take time to complete, so resources for these long-running operations were added: [calling-specific operations](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), [playing audio prompts](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), and [recording](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).

Ajout du type de ressource [printTaskDefinition](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/printtaskdefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) aux ressources prises en charge pour les [notifications de modifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/webhooks).

Ajout de [notifications de cycle de vie](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/webhooks-lifecycle) pour les types de ressource [chatMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-1.0) personnel, [contact](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event (Ã©vÃ©nement)](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) et le [message](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Ajoute [chatMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/presence) aux ressources prises en charge pour [notifications de modifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/webhooks).

Suppression de la propriÃ©tÃ© **includeProperties** de lâ€™entitÃ© [abonnement](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta). Cette propriÃ©tÃ© est remplacÃ©e par la propriÃ©tÃ© **includeResourceData**.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: chatMessage,Set up change notifications for chat messages, including message properties (preview)
ChangeList.Description: Added support for subscribing to notifications that include resource data. Currently supported resources are [chatMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-beta) resources in Microsoft Teams channels and chats. Subscribing apps will have to implement additional authorization and decryption code to benefit from this feature. For more details, see [Set up change notifications for chat messages, including message properties (preview)](webhooks-with-resource-data.md).
ChangeList.Target: chatMessage,Set up change notifications for chat messages, including message properties (preview)

ChangeList.Description: Added the [Create and send notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-post-notifications?view=graph-rest-beta) API to enable targeting users without managing the on-behalf-of tokens.

Introduced the **targetPolicy** property on the [notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/projectrome-notification?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to enable web endpoints to be targeted via webpush.

Added the **fallbackPolicy** property on the [notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/projectrome-notification?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to enable guaranteed delivery on iOS for high-priority notifications.

Added two types of lifecycle notifications, **subscriptionRemoved** and **missed**, available for Outlook resources. Subscribing apps can take appropriate actions to mitigate notification interruptions. For more details, see [Reduce missing subscriptions and notifications for Outlook resources (preview)](webhooks-lifecycle.md).
ChangeList.Target: Reduce missing subscriptions and notifications for Outlook resources (preview)

ChangeList.Description: Added the [notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/projectrome-notification?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [Create and publish notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/projectrome_notification_post?view=graph-rest-beta) API.

Ajout de la [swapShiftsChangeRequestÂ : refusez](mÃ©thode de) https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/graph/api/swapshiftschangerequest-decline?view=graph-rest-beta Ã  la ressource **swapShiftsChangeRequest**.
Added [notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for new and edited channel messages, and new and edited chat messages.
Added the [shiftpreferences](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/shiftpreferences?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.
Added new relationship **shiftPreferences** to [userSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/usersettings?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Updated the application permissions required to perform read and write operations for shifts resources, including [schedule](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedule?view=graph-rest-beta), [schedulingGroup](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedulinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta), [shift](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/shift?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOff](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoff?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOffReason](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffreason?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOffRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffrequest?view=graph-rest-beta), [swapShiftChangeRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/swapshiftchangerequest?view=graph-rest-beta), and [openShiftChangeRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshiftchangerequest?view=graph-rest-beta). **Note:** Applications permissions are currently in private preview and are not available for public use.

Added the [openshift](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshift?view=graph-rest-beta), [openshiftChangeRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshiftChangeRequest?view=graph-rest-beta), [swapShiftChangeRequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/swapShiftChangeRequest?view=graph-rest-beta), and [timeoffrequest](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffrequest?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.

Added the **timeClockEnabled**, **openShiftsEnabled**, **swapShiftsRequestsEnabled**, **offerShiftRequestsEnabled**,  **timeOffRequestsEnabled** properties to the [schedule](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedule?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added an additional route to retrieve a [driveItem] using a team and channel ID, [get driveItem](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/driveitem-get?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [Get team photo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-get-photo?view=graph-rest-beta) and [Update team photo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-update-photo?view=graph-rest-beta) methods.
[Reading images in messages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessagehostedcontent-get?view=graph-rest-beta) now support application permissions.

Added the [primaryChannel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-get-primarychannel?view=graph-rest-beta) property to the [team](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **allowCreatePrivateChannels** property to the [teamMemberSettings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teammembersettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the ability to pull incremental messages from channels with the [channel messages delta query API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-messages-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: add members to a private channel
ChangeList.Description: Added the ability to [add members to a private channel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/conversationmember-add?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: add members to a private channel

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: remove members from a private channel
ChangeList.Description: Added the ability to [remove members from a private channel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/conversationmember-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: remove members from a private channel

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: update a member's role in a private channel
ChangeList.Description: Added the ability to [update a member's role in a private channel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/conversationmember-update?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: update a member's role in a private channel

ChangeList.Description: Added the **membershipType** property to the [channel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to show if a particular channel is private or standard.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: List channel messages,Get channel message,List replies to a message,Get a reply to a message
ChangeList.Description: Added support for application permissions to [List channel messages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-list-messages?view=graph-rest-beta), [Get channel message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-get-message?view=graph-rest-beta), [List replies to a message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-list-messagereplies?view=graph-rest-beta), and [Get a reply to a message](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-get-messagereply?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: List channel messages,Get channel message,List replies to a message,Get a reply to a message

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: List messages in a chat,Get message in chat
ChangeList.Description: Added support for application permissions to [List messages in a chat](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessage-list?view=graph-rest-beta) and [Get message in chat](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessage-get?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: List messages in a chat,Get message in chat

ChangeList.Description: Added the **installedApps** property to the [chat](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chat?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added navigation binding for **chats** property of the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [teamwork](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamwork?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [userTeamwork](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userteamwork?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: user,List apps installed for user,Install app for user,Uninstall app for user,Upgrade app installed for user
ChangeList.Description:
Added new methods to the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource enabling the following methods with personal apps for users:
[List apps installed for user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Install app for user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-add-teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Uninstall app for user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-delete-teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Upgrade app installed for user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-upgrade-teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta)
ChangeList.Target: user,List apps installed for user,Install app for user,Uninstall app for user,Upgrade app installed for user

ChangeList.Description: Added the [teamDiscoverySettings](/api-reference/beta/resources/teamdiscoverysettings.md) resource and associated methods.
Added **urgent** property to the **chatMessageImportance** enum.
Added **hostedContents** navigation property to the [chatMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added **chatMessageHostedContent** entity to represent content hosted by Microsoft Teams associated with a [chatMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the [chat](/api-reference/beta/resources/chat.md) resources and associated methods.
Added APIs to read [images](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessagehostedimage?view=graph-rest-beta) in messages.
Added the [conversation member](/api-reference/beta/resources/conversationmember.md) resources and associated methods.
Added support for application permissions to the [installedApps](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **email** and **webUrl** properties to [channel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the [schedule](/api-reference/beta/resources/schedule.md), [schedulingGroup](/api-reference/beta/resources/schedulinggroup.md), [shift](/api-reference/beta/resources/shift.md), [timeOffReason](/api-reference/beta/resources/timeoffreason.md) and [timeOff](/api-reference/beta/resources/timeoff.md) resources and associated methods.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Send a message to a channel
ChangeList.Description: Introduced the [Send a message to a channel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-post-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
ChangeList.Target: Send a message to a channel

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Reply to a message in a channel
ChangeList.Description: Introduced the [Reply to a message in a channel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-post-messagereply?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
ChangeList.Target: Reply to a message in a channel

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Create a message in a channel
ChangeList.Description: Removed the POST /teams/{id}/channels/{id}/chatThreads API. Use [Create a message in a channel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-post-chatmessage?view=graph-rest-beta) instead.
ChangeList.Target: Create a message in a channel

ChangeList.Description: Added support for application permissions to the [installedApps](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **internalId** property to the [team](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Introduced [/teams/{id}/installedApps](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta), which will replace /teams/{id}/apps with some differences in payload.

Introduced new resource type [teamsAppInstallation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta).
